# cloudtemple_backup_job (Data Source)

To query this datasource you will need the `backup_read` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudtemple_backup_job" "id" {
  id = "1004"
}

data "cloudtemple_backup_job" "name" {
  name = "Hypervisor Inventory"
}
```
